scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:favicon
scripts.build:compressed: npm run build:inliner && npm run build:html-minifier
scripts.build:css: npm run compile:scss && npm run build:post:css
scripts.build:html: mkdir -p build && npm run pug:index && npm run pug:404
scripts.build:html-minifier: npm run minify:index && npm run minify:404
scripts.build:inliner: npm run build && npm run inliner:index && npm run inliner:404
scripts.build:js: mkdir -p build/assets/javascripts && browserify src/assets/javascripts/application.js -t babelify --outfile build/assets/javascripts/application.js && echo 'done'
scripts.inliner:404: inliner build/404.html --skip-absolute-urls > build/tmp && node tasks/fix-inliner-filter.js && mv build/tmp build/404.html
scripts.inliner:index: inliner build/index.html --skip-absolute-urls > build/tmp && node tasks/fix-inliner-filter.js && mv build/tmp build/index.html
scripts.minify:404: html-minifier build/404.html --collapse-whitespace --minify-css --minify-js > build/tmp && mv build/tmp build/404.html
scripts.minify:index: html-minifier build/index.html --collapse-whitespace --minify-css --minify-js > build/tmp && mv build/tmp build/index.html
scripts.serve: npm run build && npm run server
